OCD.name: WatsonPublisher
OCD.description: CloudPublisher that allows to publish data to the IBM Watson cloud platform

AD.name: Payload
AD.description: Specifies the CSV content to be published, metric values can be substituted into CSV fields using the following syntax: ${metricName} (replacement with mandatory metric): replaces the content of the payload metric named metricName into the CSV field. If no matching metric is found, the CSV row will not be published. $?{metricName} (replacement with optional metric): performs the same replacement as ${metricName}, but if no matching metric is found, an empty field will be inserted and the row will be generated.|textArea
